Windlord::

Windlord received the signal that other pod crashed and signal was 
closing of the Chivtrons's base "Oh great" thought the male "a pod is 
around and I have to choose to care TRinity or rescue the bot"at 
least he said"Terrataur, your leader, the bot who was reprogramed, 
what sort of skills and weapons he has?" while he waited the answer 
he opened his comm link to Aerotaur, Nightlight and Starstomp "Hey 
pals I'm getting a signal, it's seems that a pod is near the base I 
need that someone come back and care TRinity"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Terrataur::
>        "We did a scan for his energy signature on the way down.  
but we had a 
> while so we could survey the planet.  We also knew he was here.  
Both of 
> those our former leader wasn't able to do."
